{{Infobox command
|name=setfixedinvslot
|oplevel=2
}}

Sets fixed [[inventory]] slot with a specific [[item]].

;Syntax

: <code>setfixedinvslot <''fixedinvslotnum: int''> <''itemName: string''> [''data: int'']</code>

;Arguments

: ''fixedinvslotnum: int''
:: Specifies the number of fixed inventory slot.

: ''itemName: string''
:: Specifies the item for the fixed slot. Must be a valid [[Data values#Item IDs|item id]] (for example, <code>iron_shovel</code>), or [[Data values#Block IDs|block id]] for which items exist.

: ''data: int'' (optional)
:: Specifies the [[Player.dat format#Item structure|item data]] of the item. Must be an integer between -2,147,483,648 and 2,147,483,647 (inclusive, without the commas), but values which are invalid for the specified item id revert to 0. If not specified, defaults to 0.

;Result

: Fails if arguments are not specified correctly.
: On success, players are given the specified items in the fixed inventory slot.
